bug.author: nan-wang
bug.summary: passing port_grpc in search function leads to a TypeError
bug.description:
check the bug at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jina-ai/examples/issues/34>issue-34</denchmark-link>
Describe how you solve it avoid passing port_grpc as a keyword argument because the **kwargs has already included it. <denchmark-h:hr></denchmark-h>
